meanings.definition: A Polish dance in triple time.
meanings.sent1: During the ball, the dancers gracefully moved to the polonaises.

meanings.sent4: Her movements on the dance floor were as precise as a series of polonaises.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the polonaises filled the room with a sense of tradition.
